40 JointsInterfaceCore::JointsInterfaceCore(ros::NodeHandle &rootnh, ros::NodeHandle &robot_hwnh, std::shared_ptr<ttl_driver::TtlInterfaceCore> ttl_interface,
41  std::shared_ptr<can_driver::CanInterfaceCore> can_interface)
42  : _joint_controller_name("/niryo_robot_follow_joint_trajectory_controller"), _ttl_interface(std::move(ttl_interface)), _can_interface(std::move(can_interface))
43 {
44  init(robot_hwnh);
45 
46  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::init - Start joint hardware interface");
47  _robot.reset(new JointHardwareInterface(rootnh, robot_hwnh, _ttl_interface, _can_interface));
48 
49  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::init - Create controller manager");
50  _cm.reset(new controller_manager::ControllerManager(_robot.get(), _nh));
51 
52  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::init - Starting ros control thread...");
53  _control_loop_thread = std::thread(&JointsInterfaceCore::rosControlLoop, this);
54 
55  ROS_INFO("JointsInterfaceCore::init - Started");
56  rootnh.setParam("/niryo_robot_joints_interface/initialized", true);
57 }
58 
62 JointsInterfaceCore::~JointsInterfaceCore()
63 {
64  if (_control_loop_thread.joinable())
65  _control_loop_thread.join();
66 }
67 
73 bool JointsInterfaceCore::init(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
74 {
75  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::init - Initializing parameters...");
76  initParameters(nh);
77 
78  // in ned2, mode is not learning mode in the first time
79  _previous_state_learning_mode = (("ned2" != _hardware_version && "ned3pro" != _hardware_version) && !_simulation_mode);
80 
81  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::init - Starting services...");
82  startServices(nh);
83 
84  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::init - Starting publishers...");
85  startPublishers(nh);
86 
87  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::init - Starting subscribers...");
88  startSubscribers(nh);
89 
90  return true;
91 }
92 
97 void JointsInterfaceCore::initParameters(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
98 {
99  double control_loop_frequency{1.0};
100 
101  nh.getParam("ros_control_loop_frequency", control_loop_frequency);
102  nh.getParam("/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/hardware_version", _hardware_version);
103  nh.getParam("simulation_mode", _simulation_mode);
104  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::initParams - Ros control loop frequency %f", control_loop_frequency);
105  ROS_DEBUG("Joint Hardware Interface - hardware_version %s", _hardware_version.c_str());
106 
107  _control_loop_rate = ros::Rate(control_loop_frequency);
108 }
109 
114 void JointsInterfaceCore::startServices(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
115 {
116  _calibrate_motors_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/joints_interface/calibrate_motors", &JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackCalibrateMotors, this);
117 
118  _request_new_calibration_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/joints_interface/request_new_calibration", &JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackRequestNewCalibration, this);
119 
120  _activate_learning_mode_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/learning_mode/activate", &JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackActivateLearningMode, this);
121 
122  _reset_controller_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/joints_interface/steppers_reset_controller", &JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackResetController, this);
123 
124  _factory_calibrate_motors_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/joints_interface/factory_calibrate_motors", &JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackFactoryCalibrateMotors, this);
125 }
126 
131 void JointsInterfaceCore::startPublishers(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
132 {
133  _learning_mode_publisher = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Bool>("/niryo_robot/learning_mode/state", 10, true);
134  _publishLearningMode();
135 }
136 
141 void JointsInterfaceCore::startSubscribers(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
142 {
143  _trajectory_result_subscriber = nh.subscribe(_joint_controller_name + "/follow_joint_trajectory/result", 10, &JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackTrajectoryResult, this);
144 }

156 void JointsInterfaceCore::activateLearningMode(bool activate, int &ostatus, std::string &omessage)
157 {
158  omessage.clear();
159 
160  if (!_robot->isCalibrationInProgress()) // if not in calibration
161  {
162  if (activate != _previous_state_learning_mode) // if state different
163  {
164  _robot->activateLearningMode(activate);
165 
166  if (!activate)
167  {
168  _reset_controller = true;
169  omessage = "Deactivating learning mode";
170  }
171  else
172  {
173  omessage = "Activating learning mode";
174  }
175 
176  _previous_state_learning_mode = activate;
177  _publishLearningMode();
178  }
179  else
180  {
181  omessage = activate ? "Learning mode already activated" : "Learning mode already deactivating";
182  }
183  ostatus = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
184  }
185  else
186  {
187  omessage = "Joints Interface Core - You can't activate/deactivate learning mode during motors calibration";
188  ostatus = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::CALIBRATION_NOT_DONE;
189  }
190 }
191 
197 bool JointsInterfaceCore::rebootAll(bool torque_on)
198 {
199  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
200  std::string result_message;
201  activateLearningMode((("ned2" != _hardware_version && "ned3pro" != _hardware_version) && !_simulation_mode), result, result_message);
202  _previous_state_learning_mode = (("ned2" != _hardware_version && "ned3pro" != _hardware_version) && !_simulation_mode);
203 
204  _enable_control_loop = false;
205  bool res = _robot->rebootAll(torque_on);
206 
207  // reset ros controller to update command to be equal with position actual to avoid movement undefined
208  _enable_control_loop = true;
209  _reset_controller = true;
210 
211  // need calibration after reset joints (ned2 only)
212  if ("ned2" == _hardware_version && !_simulation_mode)
213  _robot->setNeedCalibration();
214 
215  return res;
216 }
217 
218 // *********************
219 // control loop
220 // *********************
221 
225 void JointsInterfaceCore::rosControlLoop()
226 {
227  ros::Time last_time = ros::Time::now();
228  ros::Time current_time = ros::Time::now();
229  ros::Duration elapsed_time;
230 
231  while (ros::ok())
232  {
233  if (_enable_control_loop && !_estop_flag)
234  {
235  _robot->read(current_time, elapsed_time);
236 
237  // check if a collision is occurred, reset controller to stop robot
238  if (_ttl_interface->getCollisionStatus() && !_previous_state_learning_mode && !_robot->needCalibration())
239  {
240  resetController();
241  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(2.0, "JointsInterfaceCore: collision detected by End Effector");
242  }
243  else
244  _lock_write_cnt = -1;
245 
246  current_time = ros::Time::now();
247  elapsed_time = ros::Duration(current_time - last_time);
248  last_time = current_time;
249 
250  if (_reset_controller)
251  {
252  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::rosControlLoop - Reset Controller");
253  _robot->setCommandToCurrentPosition();
254  _cm->update(ros::Time::now(), elapsed_time, true);
255  _reset_controller = false;
256  }
257  else
258  {
259  _cm->update(ros::Time::now(), elapsed_time, false);
260  }
261 
262  // we just use cmd from moveit only in torque on + calibration finished
263  if (!_previous_state_learning_mode && _lock_write_cnt == -1 && !_robot->needCalibration())
264  {
265  _robot->write(current_time, elapsed_time);
266  }
267  else if (_lock_write_cnt > 0)
268  {
269  _lock_write_cnt--;
270  }
271  else if (_lock_write_cnt == 0)
272  {
273  _lock_write_cnt = -1;
274  _reset_controller = true;
275  }
276  // bool isFreqMet = _control_loop_rate.sleep();
277  // ROS_DEBUG_COND(!isFreqMet, "JointsInterfaceCore::rosControlLoop : freq not met : expected (%f s) vs actual (%f s)", _control_loop_rate.expectedCycleTime().toSec(),
278  // _control_loop_rate.cycleTime().toSec());
279  }
280  }
281 }
282 
286 void JointsInterfaceCore::resetController()
287 {
288  _robot->setCommandToCurrentPosition();
289  // set pos and command equal
290  if ("ned2" == _hardware_version || "ned3pro" == _hardware_version)
291  {
292  _robot->write(ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(0.0));
293  _lock_write_cnt = 150;
294  _cm->update(ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(0.0), true);
295  }
296  else if (_hardware_version == "ned" || _hardware_version == "one")
297  {
298  _cm->update(ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(0.0), true);
299  _robot->synchronizeMotors(true);
300  }
301 }
302 
303 // ********************
304 // Callbacks
305 // ********************
306 
331 bool JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackResetController(niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Request & /*req*/, niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Response &res)
332 {
333  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackResetController - Reset Controller");
334 
335  // update position of joints
336  _robot->read(ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(0.0));
337 
338  resetController();
339 
340  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
341  res.message = "Reset done";
342 
343  return true;
344 }
345 
352 bool JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackCalibrateMotors(niryo_robot_msgs::SetInt::Request &req, niryo_robot_msgs::SetInt::Response &res)
353 {
354  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackCalibrateMotors - Received a calibration request");
355  int calibration_mode = req.value;
356  std::string result_message;
357  _enable_control_loop = false;
358  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
359  // first activate learning mode for ned and one
360  activateLearningMode((("ned2" != _hardware_version && "ned3pro" != _hardware_version) && !_simulation_mode), result, result_message);
361 
362  result = _robot->calibrateJoints(calibration_mode, result_message);
363  res.status = result;
364  res.message = result_message;
365 
366  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == result)
367  {
368  // we have to reset controller to avoid ros controller set command to the previous position
369  // before the calibration
370  _reset_controller = true;
371  _previous_state_learning_mode = (("ned2" != _hardware_version && "ned3pro" != _hardware_version) && !_simulation_mode);
372  _enable_control_loop = true;
373  }
374 
375  return true;
376 }
377 
384 bool JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackFactoryCalibrateMotors(FactoryCalibration::Request &req, FactoryCalibration::Response &res)
385 {
386  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackFactoryCalibrateMotors - Received a calibration request");
387 
388  if ("ned3pro" != _hardware_version)
389  {
390  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
391  res.message = "JointHardwareInterface::factoryCalibrateJoints - Can't be calibratd wrong hardware version: " + _hardware_version;
392  return true;
393  }
394 
395  _enable_control_loop = false;
396 
397  res.status = _robot->factoryCalibrateJoints(req.command, req.ids, res.message);
398  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == res.status)
399  {
400  // we have to reset controller to avoid ros controller set command to the previous position
401  // before the calibration
402  _reset_controller = true;
403  _previous_state_learning_mode = (!_simulation_mode);
404  }
405 
406  _enable_control_loop = true;
407 
408  return true;
409 }
410 
417 bool JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackRequestNewCalibration(niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Request & /*req*/, niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Response &res)
418 {
419  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackRequestNewCalibration - New calibration requested");
420  std::string result_message;
421 
422  _robot->setNeedCalibration();
423 
424  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
425  res.message = "Joints Interface Core - New calibration request has been made, you will be requested to confirm it.";
426 
427  return true;
428 }
429 
439 bool JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackActivateLearningMode(niryo_robot_msgs::SetBool::Request &req, niryo_robot_msgs::SetBool::Response &res)
440 {
441  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackActivateLearningMode - activate learning mode");
442 
443  activateLearningMode(req.value, res.status, res.message);
444  return true;
445 }
446 
451 void JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackTrajectoryResult(const control_msgs::FollowJointTrajectoryActionResult & /*msg*/)
452 {
453  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::_callbackTrajectoryResult - Received trajectory RESULT");
454  _robot->synchronizeMotors(false);
455 }
456 
460 void JointsInterfaceCore::_publishLearningMode()
461 {
462  ROS_DEBUG("JointsInterfaceCore::_publishLearningMode");
463 
464  std_msgs::Bool msg;
465  msg.data = _previous_state_learning_mode;
466  _learning_mode_publisher.publish(msg);
467 }
